title: Translation Technology-supported Online Course for Strengthening Cross-cultural Science Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and foreign language (English or other) communication skills
context.additional_context: Participants interact with learners of diverse nationalities via online collaboration tools, overcoming language barriers through real-time translation technology, with emphasis on comparing/critical analysis of cultural differences in scientific fields

learning_goals: Learners can convey key concepts with over 80% accuracy using language translation skills during cross-cultural scientific communication.
Learners can collaborate with peers from four or more different cultural backgrounds to produce comparative analysis reports on scientific phenomena.
Learners can identify and explain three or more differences in procedural/declarative knowledge that arise in cross-cultural collaboration within scientific fields.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
